text: Kenneth Patrick Weatherwax (September 29, 1955 â€“ December 7, 2014) known as Kenny and billed as "Ken" Weatherwax, was an American actor. He was best known for having played Pugsley Addams on the original The Addams Family television series. Weatherwax died from a heart attack at his home on December 7, 2014 at the age of 59. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1955 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Actors from Los Angeles Category:American child actors Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction
